title: 服务器实体崩溃！急！
author: Deep_
txt_content:

怎么解决

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
拔刀剑（删了就可以了
或者尝试开启config\forge.cfg中的自动清除出错实体（removeErroringEntities
